title: Gboard picks up a better layout, Material You design on Galaxy Z Fold 3, hints at split keyboard
content:
As Google has been pushing for better tablet and foldable support in Android, the company’s own Gboard keyboard has somewhat fallen behind. Now, it seems Google is working on improving its support for at least the Galaxy Z Fold 3, with a new layout going live in Gboard and a hint at more coming.

more…

The post Gboard picks up a better layout, Material You design on Galaxy Z Fold 3, hints at split keyboard appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has updated Gboard with support for an improved layout and a Material You design on the Galaxy Z Fold 3, with a hint for more to come.
